title: Marsh - Billings - Rockefeller National Historical Park: Teaching with Museum Collections
body: × Rate the Lesson Plan             Curricula Teaching with Museum Collections   Marsh-Billings-Rockefeller National Historical Park, Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site          Sunset in Yosemite Valley William Bradford MABI 1758          Overall Rating  Add your review    Students will make detailed observations and create two artistic images, one realistic and other abstract, based on a landscape painting's most important features. Students will reflect on their chosen painting and the experience of interacting in depth with a specific work of art and compose label-style text about their chosen painting.Students will collaboratively design and develop Hudson River School-style murals.
